Method: Crafted by Level 30 Alchemist with Faded Copy of Dark Vows, dropped in Tam-Tara Deepcroft or Tam-Tara Deepcroft (Hard).

Name: Riptide
Method: Crafted by Level 30 Alchemist with Faded Copy of Riptide, dropped in Sastasha or Sastasha (Hard).
